channel.title: Please help anyone?
channel.description: Can anyone tell me how to add text to an interface please? anyone?

item.title: Please help anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Infernal_Pure Infernal Pure
item.description:
@Infernal_Pure wrote:

When I compiled -

[code=java]}
if (objectID == 4484) {

       c.getPA().showInterface(837);        c.getPA().sendFrame126("nmnm", 13589);  
		}[/code]

It showed the symbol it can’t find is -

} if (objectID == 4484) { ^ c.getPA().showInterface(837); c.getPA().sendFrame126("nmnm", 13589); }

Meaning that the ‘o’ in objectID is impropper.

Try changing it to a capital… I don’t know you’re server files. Sorry if I couldn’t help

Read full topic

item.title: Please help anyone?
item.dc:creator: @ZOMGROFL ZOMGROFL
item.description:
@ZOMGROFL wrote:

i compiled and it said can’t find symbol? is this what the whole code should look like?

[code]}
if (objectID == 4484)
{
c.getPA().showInterface(837); c.getPA().sendFrame126(“nmnm”, 13589);

                        c.sendMessage("nmnm"); 
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Please help anyone?
item.dc:creator: @Infernal_Pure Infernal Pure
item.description:
@Infernal_Pure wrote:

Depending on the DEOB of it, but for mine ( 562 loading 602 ) To send text to an interface would go as shown -

c.getPA().showInterface(13585); c.getPA().sendFrame126("EnterMessage.", 13589);

OR if you want it to be shown on the interface, AND the text box, you’d go.

c.getPA().showInterface(13585); c.getPA().sendFrame126("EnterMessage", 13589); c.sendMessage("EnterMessage");

Hope I Helped (:

Read full topic
